channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: SEC chair Gensler claps back at Coinbase, says crypto rules already exist
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Speaking at the Financial Markets Conference, the SEC chair asserted that the rules for crypto are already in place and that the crypto sector has been largely non-compliant.

item.title: US Secret Service holds crypto, praises blockchain tech in Reddit AMA
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: In a crypto-themed AMA session on Reddit on May 15, the U.S. Secret Service answered a wide range of questions and revealed their little-known NFT collection.

item.title: ChatGPT creator OpenAI is releasing an open-source AI model: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: The firm behind ChatGPT is seemingly under pressure from other available open-source AI models and is prepping to enter the space with one of its own.

item.title: Minneapolis Fed president Kashkari weighs in on CBDC: ‘Handwaving word salad’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: When asked about CBDCs during a conference on transportation, Kashkari had a response on the tip of his tongue, and it wasn’t encouraging for CBDC fans.

item.title: $500K worth of stETH redeemed in 3 hours as Lido enables withdrawals
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Ethereum was upgraded to allow withdrawals on April 13, but Lido had not previously integrated with the new feature.

item.title: Digital asset market shrinks as fund outflows reach $200M: CoinShares
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: According to CoinShares, digital asset investment products saw outflows totaling $54 million last week.

item.title: This Bitcoin options strategy allows early bird traders to prepare for BTC’s next breakout
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Crypto traders expecting a price reversal could use this options strategy to get positioned in Bitcoin.

item.title: Amazon is hiring AI engineers to build a ChatGPT-like search interface
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: A pair of postings on Amazon’s jobs website indicates the company is planning to implement advanced AI search features in its online web store.

item.title: Japan leads world in losses from North Korean crypto hacking with 30% of total: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: An Elliptic report commissioned by Nikkei says Asian countries account for over 60% of losses to North Korean hackers and ransomware users; lax security played a role.

item.title: $28,000 Bitcoin is in the cards, but it won’t happen without a struggle
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Professional Bitcoin traders displayed strength after the BTC price corrected to $25,830, favoring further bullish momentum.

item.title: Bitcoin offers ‘good signs’ as analysts retain $40K BTC price target
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin is showing the strength it needs for a continuation higher, says Michaël van de Poppe, after key trend lines are preserved.

item.title: Price analysis 5/15: SPX, DXY, BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, SOL, MATIC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: The debt ceiling talks remain in focus and are likely to dictate the price action in the S&P 500, DXY and cryptocurrency markets in the near term.

item.title: Tether boasts of its financial stability after strong profits, money moved out of banks
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Tether Holdings wants to make sure the world is aware of its positive first-quarter attestation in the face of rumors and criticism.

item.title: G7 pushes accelerating global implementation of ‘travel rule’ for crypto assets
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Group of 7 members met in Japan, where they discussed CBDCs and crypto regulation, with an eye toward quickly implementing the “Travel Rule” for crypto assets.

item.title: Why is Litecoin price up today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.category: Why is Litecoin price up today
item.description: Litecoin's entry into the nonfungible token (NFT) sector has boosted retail traders' appetite for LTC tokens.

item.title: South Korean authorities raid Upbit, Bithumb crypto exchanges after political scandal
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The raids came as a local lawmaker stepped down from politics amid accusations of allegedly selling millions in cryptocurrency before new laws were enforced.

item.title: SEC under fire for its custody rule: Law Decoded, May 8–15
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: Last week was harsh for the United States Securities Exchange Commission, with industry figures and officials publicly criticizing the regulator.

item.title: Make 500% from ChatGPT stock tips? Bard leans left, $100M AI memecoin: AI Eye
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Andrew Fenton
item.description: How to create a $100M memecoin with ChatGPT, $50K portfolio handed over to AI targeting 500% return, and will writers have a job in future?

item.title: What’s next for NFTs and Web3 in the age of the creator economy?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tomer Warschauer Nuni
item.description: The advantage of Web3 is that it grants users ownership of their data. Creators will be able to treat their data as their own personal property and be paid for whatever content they create, and others consume.

item.title: US strips Ethereum dev Virgil Griffith of export privileges for 10 years
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: The export privilege ban comes from Griffith’s conviction and further impacts his involvement in international trade and transactions.

item.title: Irish newspaper apologizes for misleading AI-generated article
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: A daily newspaper in Ireland released a statement saying it was “deliberately deceived” into believing the identity of a guest writer, which turned out to be AI.

item.title: South Korean lawmaker leaves political party amid crypto investment controversy
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: A lawmaker allegedly sold over $4 million in cryptocurrency prior to the country’s enforcement of the “Travel Rule” from the Financial Action Task Force.

item.title: Are ZK-proofs the answer to Bitcoin’s Ordinal and BRC-20 problem?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Zero-knowledge proofs could be a viable means to address recent network congestion and high fees on the Bitcoin blockchain.

item.title: Amazon implements AI to enhance logistics and delivery speeds
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: Amazon will reportedly use AI to minimize product-customer distance, highlighting its impact on transportation, product search and inventory.

item.title: Sink or swim at $27K? 5 things to know in Bitcoin this week
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin bulls and bears battle for control of a key area on the BTC chart, with network fundamentals due new all-time highs.

item.title: Bitcoin a top 3 asset in the event of US debt default: Survey
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Bitcoin would be a more popular safe haven than the U.S. dollar, the Japanese yen or the Swiss franc, according to a new survey.

item.title: How to use a VPN for online security and privacy
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Explore how to use a VPN for enhanced online security and privacy using step-by-step instructions.

item.title: Samsung to research South Korea’s CBDC for offline payments
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: The collaboration will have both parties researching the offline capabilities of the CBDC issued by South Korea’s central bank.

item.title: US Justice Department on the hunt for DeFi hackers and thieves: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: The U.S. Justice Department’s top crypto cop said that it was a “pretty significant issue,” given the rise of North Korean “state-sponsored hackers.”

item.title: Primordial NFT? Someone tried to sell a JPEG for BTC months before Bitcoin Pizza Day
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: The seller even got help from Bitcoin founder Satoshi Nakamoto, though it's still up in the air whether the artist actually made the "sale."
